title: Anybody else having severe battery drain after January update? Update to RQ1A.210105.002 -> -50%
content:
Tried all the suggestions from the following link https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/6090599?hl=en with no results.

I used to have about 30% of battery left when going to sleep. Day after updating to RQ1A.210105.002 phone died on my way home from work. Repeated 3 days in a row. So, instead of having 30% left after 16 hours, it now dies on me after 9-10 hours.

Any suggestions or observations?
